document.full_text: world stocks extended losses on thursday and the dollar hovered near a one-month lows against major currencies after a run of dismal economic data pointed to a faltering recovery in the united states.
document.title: world stocks and oil extend losses on global growth fears
lines_and_colors: world stocks extended losses on thursday and the dollar hovered near a one-month lows against major currencies after a run of dismal economic data pointed to a faltering recovery in the united states.
